title: Agile Retrospectives
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Agile Retrospectives is an add-on for Jira and Confluence to run interactive retrospectives sessions, create action items and keep history of your past sessions.
detailsText:
Work within a remote team can be challenging, that an opportunity area we found. Our goal itâ€™s to build an app that could help remote teams on their retrospectives sessions in an easy way.

Customization was a feature that many users asked in the app. But it was complicated by the limitations in the platform.
The solution: We give the scrum master an option to choose the number of topics (up to 4), so they could custumize their retrospective session.
